org.apache.coyote

接口 ActionHook

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractAjpProcessor, AbstractHttp11Processor, AbstractProcessor, AjpAprProcessor, AjpNioProcessor, AjpProcessor, Http11AprProcessor, Http11NioProcessor, Http11Processor

    public interface ActionHook
    Action hook. Actions represent the callback mechanism used by coyote servlet containers to request operations on the coyote connectors. Some standard actions are defined in ActionCode, however custom actions are permitted. The param object can be used to pass and return informations related with the action. This interface is typically implemented by ProtocolHandlers, and the param is usually a Request or Response object.
    作者:
    Remy Maucherat

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void action(ActionCode actionCode, java.lang.Object param)
      Send an action to the connector.

    • 方法详细资料

      • action

        void action(ActionCode actionCode,
            java.lang.Object param)
        Send an action to the connector.
        参数:
        actionCode - Type of the action
        param - Action parameter
